beginnings.title: The Beginnings
beginnings.content: PurpleShop was born in 2025 with a clear vision: to transform the way people buy, sell, and share objects. Founded by a group of entrepreneurs passionate about the circular economy, our platform started as a small local community in Madrid.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At PurpleShop, we believe in a future where conscious consumption and reuse are the norm, not the exception. Our mission is to facilitate meaningful connections between people, enabling them to give objects a second life and build a more sustainable community.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.content: We actively promote reuse and responsible consumption.

community.title: Community
community.content: We build meaningful connections between people.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We constantly improve our platform experience.

future.title: Looking to the Future
future.content: We continue to innovate and expand our platform, always with the goal of making second-hand buying-selling and object donation more accessible and attractive to everyone. Together, we are building a more sustainable future.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Society
commitment.content: At PurpleShop, our social impact goes beyond facilitating transactions. We strive to create positive change in society and the environment through various initiatives and programs.

environmental.title: Environmental Impact
environmental.content: We have helped significantly reduce carbon footprint by promoting product reuse.
environmental.label: Tons of CO₂ avoided

community.content: We build an active community of people committed to responsible consumption.
